extendedInfo.description: The living dead have overrun rural Texas! Four gritty Texans have survived the initial onslaught and have banded together to take on the Zombie Horde. Lead their struggle to survive!Zed, a swaggering Texas Cowboy, is deadly accurate with weapons such as his .270 caliber deer hunting rifle, but has a poor rate of fire since he refuses to put out his cigarette even during the Zombie Necropalypse.Candi has poor accuracy and slow reload time, but she is very pretty.Toby has average accuracy and reload time, but has a very high rate of fire. He reasons that the solution to the rise of the walking dead is simply a matter of putting enough lead in the air.Oma is the deadliest of the survivors. She's a grandmother of eight and a great-grandmother of four. She has nearly perfect accuracy and good reload time, having lived in Texas all of her life. She's seen worse than "this whole livin' dead thing" and she knows everything will turn out fine in the end.Guide the survivors to scavenge the wreckage of the town by day for additional resources such as guns or bombs, or instead spend daylight hours improving your survivors' defensive positions. But when the sun goes down the Horde awakes, so at night there is only â¦ Zombie Defense!

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: This is a well put together game but it gets way to hard way to fast. There arent enough options on defence or just about anything. I would give it five stars if you give everyone more of a chance. Would also be cool if we could find more people and have more guns
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The zombies are appearing as a box
reviews.comment: The zombies are glitching as a grey box these glitches annoy me a lot so please do fix this
reviews.author: gian layag

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Everyone having probably with force close on DROID, I found the prob. The game installs to sd card automatically.go to game settings and move to phone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Never really liked defense games, but i am really loving this game
reviews.author: Steve Taylor

reviews.title: Jordan
reviews.comment: pretty enjoyable game :) . but its missing the \'buy weapons and upgrade items and weapons\' . also needs a bigger selection of different survivors you can pick with special abilities. the scavenging during the day is a bad idea. ya need buy weapons, zombies should be worth money to buy weapons.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Fun game, but it needs to let you find other survivors.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.comment: I think the idea is awesome, gameplay gets stale though.
reviews.author: Switch Banka

reviews.title: Great game!!!
reviews.comment: Very fun game. Took two days to beat. Recommend not moving around. If you camp at one location its easier to survive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very Fun Zombie group survival game! Much like many of the Flash based PC ones out there, classic!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: To simple, to slow
reviews.comment: All you get to do is assign guns to four players and pick their spot in a small room, with only one entrance. You don\'t even have to move them though, sad. The dynomite comes in handy if you\'re loosing a round, which was the most exciting moment of the two hours I played in shame. Oh wait, they all ate chocolate & sodas, but you had to figure out who got the pack of sigs. Stupid game, SAME ADDVERTISEMENT EVERY ROUND... \'nuff said!
reviews.author: Chadd Simpson

reviews.title: Really good... But...
reviews.comment: As I said, really God game here, I like the strategy behind everything you do. The searching system is definitely my favorite strategic effect. Sacrificing time (used for searching for oh so necessary weapons) for defensive objects, but (LOOK HERE) you definitely  should either give us something to do in action sequences (other than detonate dynamite and throw Molotovs), or make waves shorter. I like the strategy, but it draws on way too long.
reviews.author: Joe Figone

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: By the 4th round I got 2 M16\'s an AK47 and 3 magnums and a 12 gage. To win this game give oma the AK, M16 to the cowboy, M16 to the gangster and the glock or rifle to the hoochie and keep the search at 6 unless you need cocktails and barriers you def. Will need bombs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kind of boring
reviews.comment: Not the worst, but one of the least entertaining defense games I have played. UI is a little bit clunky.  It would not have been a big deal if the game had been fun, but it is not optimized for a tablet.
reviews.author: Joel de Berry

reviews.comment: Super fun game but gets too hard too fast...even on easy. Then gives you crap weaponry.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but...
reviews.comment: Entertaining game.. sucks that if by night 10 u dont have at least 2-3 automatics its impossible.. hate how random search is compared to hours searched... eventually even with that many automatics u cant make enough special abilitys to survive the round... Game suggests moving to different locations to dwindle zombie #s but i can not verify this at all.. doesn\'t seem to work at all. The only thing it really seems to do is spread out ur already lil amounts of supplies. Luck of ur searches determines outcome.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Fun but prepare to start the game over after the tenth night. Seems that\'s where my guys always die LOL.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good game
reviews.comment: It is a very well made game. Head and solder above many zombie theam games. However there is room for improvements, like more defense options.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Ok 4 stars & I\'m generous Because it could be a great game with a few update : ex: Upgrading weapon & men,different zombies ,select level ,bonus ...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This game is very challenging. We need to fight the zombie for 20 days until the rescue.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No good
reviews.comment: Barely see zombies as they show up as grey squares 90% of the time. No tutorial to speak of.
